data.title: Atari Pong Table - Best Inflatable Funfair & Exhibition Game Hire UK service in Sheffield, Rotherham, Doncaster, Leeds, Manchester, Derby, Birmingham, Hull
data.meta_description: Atari Pong Table is one of the wide range of products available from DB Entertainment events experts. Contact us today!
data.text:
Atari Pong Hire

This quality company Atari has made and designed this interactive pong game for years and now their latest model is here.

Atari in Japanese means ‘neighbourhood’ and this game would be perfect for creating an atmosphere for colleagues in a work place or at a fun, corporate event.

Take on your opponent and try and use your handle to stop the pong going into your goal area while trying to push the pong into your opponents.

You also have the option to put the settings to 1 player and take on the computerised opponent at the same game.

Included with the game is 2 official Atari chairs, at the right height for playing Atari pong.

We have hired the Atari pong to exhibition stands, corporate events, office and work place parties, private parties and festive events.

One of the large events at Manchester Trafford centre for a brand launch we hired the Atari Pong out to a client. At Birmingham Arena we delivered and staffed the Atari Pong for a staff party celebrating an anniversary milestone to bring some friendly competition to the night.

We have hired the Atari Pong Table out with Grab a Grand, Batak and Virtual Bowling.

For more information or to put together a package of items, please call our office on 0114 345 0135 or fill our enquiry page out by clicking here.

Location – Atari Pong Hire - From our Base in Rotherham/ Sheffield, we are ideally placed next to the major motorway networks including the A1, M1 and M18. This allows us to cover the whole of the UK, including the North East of England and especially South Yorkshire. West Yorkshire and Greater Manchester are just on our Doorstep and for larger packages, we regularly deliver our services and equipment to many areas including London, Birmingham and Wales to name a few.

What’s included with Atari Pong hire –

Set up & installed on site by our specialist team

Full operational tutorial and instructions

Telephone support and guidance

Collection and removal from site – delivery charges may apply

Optional in-house branding available

Branding for Atari Pong

Printed Bottom Board £95 (We can retain this for future events free of charge - please note we remain the owners of this)

Optional extra Score board branding - Top £29 full front wrap £69

(Please note branding includes the purchase of sticker transfers that are suitable only to be used on the machine for one hire period)
